page.title: 20THE CONTRIBUTORS
page.content: The work for this project has been carried out by{9 Boys}and{6 Girls}from Kirkbie Kendal School all aged 14 years. They were chosen for the work because of their interest,intelligence and ability to work unsupervised.Their {names}are: Jonathan Boyd, Robert Chap- low, Ben Corrie, Paul Dodds,Serge Lang Nicholas Littlewood, Craig pennington, Michael Stockton, Neil Watson, Lorr- aine Dixon, Alison Jenkins, Caroline Marrows, Odette Williamson, Cheryl Wilson and Catherine Winstanley. Their {hobbies}range from badminton, bird- watching, chess and computing to sci- ence, skiing, swimming & table tennis. They attend one of the two {comprehensive schools}in the town which together send an average of 60 students every year to higher educ- ation elsewhere,including "Oxbridge". {
